— A Partnership To The Top

About APEX Consultancy

APEX is a licensed consultancy firm serving SMEs across Saudi Arabia with accounting, financial and administrative expertise.

Who we are

We’re specialists in accounting, finance and management, helping partners operate efficiently and make confident decisions across retail, entertainment & sports, construction, restaurants and e-commerce.

Core Values

  • Quality: Professional standards, timely delivery, decision-ready outputs.
  • Confidentiality & Commitment: Information confidentiality and professional ethics across all departments.
  • Impact & Improvement: Solutions that empower clients and evolve with industry change.

Our Vision

To be a leading safe haven for SMEs in Saudi Arabia—supporting short, medium and long-term goals while enhancing sustainability and growth.

Objectives

Instill the value of financial management by delivering sustainable solutions and advice that drive operational efficiency and long-term value.

Management Team

Abdulaziz Dulaimi, CMA

CEO

10+ years in financial management, budgeting, analysis & restructuring; contributed to obtaining two SAMA licenses (crowdfunding & payments). MBA, Cleveland State.

Abdulaziz@apexconsultancy-sa.com

Ahmad Mohammad, CMA, VAT Specialist, IFRS

Financial & Accounting Consultant

11+ years in the KSA market; leadership roles in budgeting, cash flow, receivables, VAT and financial policies. MSc (UOW), BSc (Petra).

ahmad@apexconsultancy-sa.com

Shadi Al-Quedmani, IFRS

Accounting Manager

8+ years across finance & accounting: financial statements, analysis & budgeting. BCom & Econ (Damascus).

shadi@apexconsultancy-sa.com
